participant_1.background:
I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.
I stretch to get my blood flowing.
i am a recovering alcoholic.
i still call my ex boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special.
i am excellent at playing pool.

participant_2.background:
I'm the son of lawyers and I can make fart noises with my armpits.
i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books.
my mother was an rn.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw, paint and make games that help animals in need.
That sounds really interesting, what kind of games do you make?
I make games that help animals learn how to avoid dangerous situations and how to live healthier lives.
That's a great way to use your talents! I'm sure you're making a difference in the world.
Thanks! I hope so! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play pool, it's a great way to relax and socialize.
I've never played pool, but it sounds like fun! I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's easy to learn and a lot of fun.
Thanks for the suggestion, I will!
No problem!
I also like to read, my favorite series is Game of Thrones.
I love Game of Thrones! I'm so excited for the new season.
Me too! I'm not sure how they're going to wrap everything up, but I'm sure it's going to be amazing.
I'm sure it will be! It's always so hard to say goodbye to a good series.
I know, right? But it's always fun to look back on all the great moments.
Yeah, it is. I'm going to miss Game of Thrones when it's over, but I'm sure I'll be able to find other great shows to watch.
Me too! I'm always looking for new things to watch.
Well, it was nice chatting with you! I hope you have a great day!
Thanks, you too
